meanings.definition: A woman with exceptional abilities or powers.
meanings.sent1: The superwomen in the comic saved the city from danger.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the superwomen in the field of science.
meanings.sent3: The superwomen at the office always finish their work before lunch.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and strength make her a superwomen in our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The superwomen's courage inspired everyone around her.

meanings.definition: Women who are considered to be outstanding or exceptional in some way.
meanings.sent1: The superwomen of the community organized a charity event.
meanings.sent2: She was recognized as one of the superwomen in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The superwomen at the party had everyone laughing with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination and leadership skills make her a superwomen among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The superwomen's grace and intelligence left a lasting impression on everyone she met.
